text: Final Fantasy X is a fantasy role-playing video game made by Square Enix. It is the 10th game in the Final Fantasy video game series. The game was released in 2001, and is the first Final Fantasy game that was made for the Sony PlayStation 2 video game console. == Other websites == *Official Final Fantasy X website *Final Fantasy X articles at Wikia Category:2001 video games Category:Final Fantasy games Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:Single- player video games Category:Sony Interactive Entertainment games Category:Turn-based role-playing video games
title: Final Fantasy X
